Uses of Package
com.microsoft.windowsazure.management.sql

  • Packages that use com.microsoft.windowsazure.management.sql 
    Package Description
    com.microsoft.windowsazure.management.sql
    This package contains the sql management class, interface, and associated configuration and utility classes.
  • Classes in com.microsoft.windowsazure.management.sql used by com.microsoft.windowsazure.management.sql 
    Class and Description
    DacOperations
    Includes operations for importing and exporting Azure SQL Databases into and out of Azure blob storage.
    DatabaseCopyOperations
    Represents the SQL Database Management API includes operations for managing SQL Server database copies for a subscription.
    DatabaseOperationOperations
    The Azure SQL Database Management API includes operations for getting database operations.
    DatabaseOperations
    Represents all the operations for operating on Azure SQL Databases.
    FirewallRuleOperations
    The Azure SQL Database Management API includes operations for managing the server-level Firewall Rules for Azure SQL Database Servers.
    QuotaOperations
    The Azure SQL Database Management API includes operations for getting Azure SQL Database Server quotas.
    RecoverableDatabaseOperations
    Contains operations for getting Azure SQL Databases that can be recovered.
    RecoverDatabaseOperations
    Contains the operation to create recovery requests for Azure SQL Databases.
    RestorableDroppedDatabaseOperations
    Contains operations for getting dropped Azure SQL Databases that can be restored.
    RestoreDatabaseOperations
    Contains the operation to create restore requests for Azure SQL Databases.
    ServerOperations
    Contains methods to allow various operations on Azure SQL Database Servers.
    ServiceObjectiveOperations
    This class provides methods to get a specific service objective by using its ID or to List all of the service objectives on a server.
    SqlManagementClient
    This is the main client class for interacting with the Azure SQL Database REST APIs.
    SqlManagementClientImpl
    This is the main client class for interacting with the Azure SQL Database REST APIs.
